Downloading... and tested:

Great job Mike, now it flies really well, during ascent and re-entry too, atmospheric flight almost perfect.

In vacuum there are a couple of issues, first the OMS tends to produce a phantom thrust, also at 0% of throttle. To avoid it I needed to deactivate the OMS between maneuvers and second, the RCS now it's not working at all, I don't know the reason.

On a side note, I suggest to add Stock Bug Fix mod from Claw as a suggested mod. While the STS is a single piece, it's possible (it happened to me one time on three test) that the overheathing bug will occur, cause the KSP heat system doesn't like big parts attached to little parts. So, If I launch the STS with some science parts in the cargo bay, or something composed by little parts, they will explode due to overheating.

Btw, the atmospheric side is done in my opinion.
